title: Braised lamb with plum sauce and broad beans
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '500g lamb loin fillet, cut into 4cm pieces', '2 tablespoons plain flour', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '200ml bottled plum sauce', '125ml chicken stock', '500g frozen broad beans, thawed', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme leaves']
